entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 5:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 9.2°C
Wind: S 58 km/h gust 85 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with rain showers or flurries. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
